### Challenge 1

Create a vector of numbers 1-50 repeated 3 times and assign that to object called "mydata".

### Challenge 2

Convert "mydata" to a factor and assign it to a vector called "myfactor" 

### Challenge 3

Create a new vector that has everything 10th element from "mydata" created in Challenge 1.
